name: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Arcade Future Tone
overview:
Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Arcade Future Tone is the sequel to the original arcade version of Project Diva.

Like its predecessor the gameplay is mostly the same as the original portable titles in the series. Notable changes from the first game include upgraded graphics and physics, a Touch Slider panel for the arrow shaped notes, new songs, and running on the more powerful Sega Nu arcade board.
